[source, js]
----
const response = await client.watcher.executeWatch({
  ignore_condition: true,
  watch: {
    trigger: {
      schedule: {
        interval: "10s",
      },
    },
    input: {
      search: {
        request: {
          indices: ["logs"],
          body: {
            query: {
              match: {
                message: "error",
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
    condition: {
      compare: {
        "ctx.payload.hits.total": {
          gt: 0,
        },
      },
    },
    actions: {
      log_error: {
        logging: {
          text: "Found {{ctx.payload.hits.total}} errors in the logs",
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
----
